S04bsu014_u:103_16: catvāri ca adhiṣṭhānāni, saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyāśca dharmāḥ,
S04bsu014_u:103_17: trīṇi ca vimokṣamukhāni, samāsataḥ sarvabodhyaṅgikā dharmāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe paripūryante /
S04bsu014_u:104_0: evamukte vimukticandro bodhisattvo vajragarbhaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - kiṃ punarbho jinaputrā asyāmeva saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya sarvabodhyaṅgikā dharmāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe paripūryante,
S04bsu014_u:104_1: āhosvitsarvāsu daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu? vajragarbha āha - sarvāsu bho jinaputrā daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu bodhisattvasya sarvabodhyaṅgāni kṣaṇe kṣaṇe paripūryante,
S04bsu014_u:104_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? iyaṃ bho jinaputrā bodhisattvabhūmiḥ prāyogikacaryāparipūraṇī ca jñānābhijñānacaryākramaṇī ca /
S04bsu014_u:104_4: api tu khalu punarbho jinaputrāḥ prathamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sarvapraṇidhānādhyālambena bodhisattvasya sarvabodhyaṅgāni kṣaṇe kṣaṇe paripūryante /
S04bsu014_u:104_7: caturthyāṃ mārgāvatāreṇa / pañcamyāṃ lokatrayānuvṛtyā / ṣaṣṭyāṃ gambhīradharmamukhapraveśena /
S04bsu014_u:104_8: asyāṃ tu saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sarvabuddhadharmasamutthāpanatayā kṣaṇe kṣaṇe sarvabodhyāṅgāni paripūryante /
S04bsu014_u:104_9: [Dbh_38] tatkasya hetoḥ? yāni bodhisattvena prathamāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimupādāya yāvatsaptamī bodhisattvabhūmirityabhinirhṛtāni jñānābhinirhāraprayogāṅgāni,
S04bsu014_u:104_11: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrā dvayorlokadhātvoḥ saṃkliṣṭaviśuddhāśayaśca lokadhātorekāntapariśuddhāśayaśca lokadhātorlokāntarikā duratikramā na śakyā yathātathātikramitumanyatra mahābhijñābalādhānāt,
S04bsu014_u:104_12: evameva bho jinaputra vyāmiśrapariśuddhā bodhisattvacaryāntarikā duratikramā na śakyā yathātathātikramitumanyatra mahāpraṇidhānopāyaprajñābhijñābalādhānāt /
S04bsu014_u:104_13: vimukticandra āha - kiṃ punarbho jinaputra saptasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu kleśacaryāsaṃkliṣṭā bodhisattvacaryā pratyetavyā? vajragarbha āha - prathamāmeva bho jinaputra bodhisattvabhūmimupādāya sarvābodhisattvacaryāpagatakleśakalmāṣā bodhipariṇāmanādhipatyena pratyetavyā /
S04bsu014_u:104_14: yathābhāgimārgasamatayā, (na ca) tāvatsaptasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu samatikrāntā kleśacaryetyavācanīyā /
S04bsu014_u:104_15: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra rājā cakravartī divyaṃ hastiratnamabhirūḍhaścaturo dvīpānākramati,
S04bsu014_u:104_18: yadā punarmanuṣyāśrayaṃ hitvā brahmalokopapanno bhavati brāhmyavimānamabhirūḍhaḥ,
S04bsu014_u:104_22: evameva bhoḥ prathamāṃ bhūmimupādāya bodhisattvaḥ pāramitāyānābhirūḍhaḥ sarvajagadanuvicaran saṃkleśadoṣān prajānāti,
S04bsu014_u:104_25: saptasu bhūmiṣu sarvaprāyogikacaryāṃ vihāya saptamyā bhūmeraṣṭamīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimavakrānto bhavati,
S04bsu014_u:104_26: tadā pariśuddhaṃ bodhisattvayānamabhirūḍhaḥ sarvajagadanuvicaran sarvajagatsaṃkleśadoṣān prajānāti,
S04bsu014_u:104_28: asyāṃ punarbho jinaputra sapyamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattvo bhūyastvena rāgādipramukhaṃ sarvakleśagaṇaṃ samatikrānto bhavati /
S04bsu014_u:104_29: so 'syāṃ dūraṃgamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau caran bodhisattvo 'saṃkleśāniṣkleśa iti vaktavyaḥ /
S04bsu014_u:104_30: tatkasmāt? asamudācārātsarvakleśānāṃ na saṃkleśa iti vaktavyaḥ /
S04bsu014_u:105_0: so 'syāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattvo 'dhyāśayapariśuddhena kāyakarmaṇā samanvāgato bhavati /
S04bsu014_u:105_1: adhyāśayapariśuddhena vākkarmaṇā adhyāśayapariśuddhena manaskarmaṇā samanvāgato bhavati /
S04bsu014_u:105_4: ye ceme daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānubhāvitāḥ,
S04bsu014_u:105_6: yāni laukikāni śilpasthānakarmasthānāni yānyabhinirhṛtāni pañcamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau,
S04bsu014_u:105_8: sa ācāryaḥ saṃmato bhavati trisāhasra mahāsāhasralokadhātau,
S04bsu014_u:105_11: nāsya kaścitsamo bhavatyāśayena vā prayogeṇa vā /
S04bsu014_u:105_12: yāni cemāni dhyānāni [Dbh_39] samādhayaḥ samapattayo 'bhijñā vimokṣāśca,
S04bsu014_u:105_14: na ca tāvadvipākataḥ pariniṣpannāni bhavanti tadyathāpi nāma aṣṭamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu014_u:105_15: asyāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya sarvacittotpādeṣu prajñopāyabhāvanābalaṃ paripūryate /
S04bsu014_u:106_0: so 'syāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitaḥ san suvicitavicayaṃ ca nāma bodhisattvasamādhi samāpadyate /
S04bsu014_u:106_1: suvicintitārthaṃ ca nāma ... / viśeṣamatiṃ ca nāma ... / prabhedārthakośaṃ ca ... / sarvārthavicayaṃ ca ... / supratiṣṭhitadṛḍhamūlaṃ ca ... / jñānābhijñāmukhaṃ ca ... / dharmadhātu(pari)karmaṃ ca ... / tathāgatānuśaṃsaṃ ca ... / vicitrārthakośasaṃsāranirvāṇamukhaṃ ca bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpadyate /
S04bsu014_u:106_2: sa evaṃpramukhāni mahābhijñājñānamukhāni paripūrṇāni daśa samādhiśatasahasrāṇi bhūmipariśodhikāni samāpadyate /
S04bsu014_u:107_0: sa eṣāṃ samādhīnāmupāyaprajñāsupariśodhitānāṃ pratilambhānmahākaruṇābalena cātikrānto bhavati śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim,
S04bsu014_u:108_0: tasya asyāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya apramāṇaṃ kāyakarma nimittāpagataṃ pravartate /
S04bsu014_u:108_3: prathamāyāmeva bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya apramāṇaṃ kāyavāṅmanaskarma sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhacaryāṃ samatikrāntaṃ bhavati? vajragarbha āha - bhavati bho jinaputra /
S04bsu014_u:108_5: na punaḥ svabuddhivicāreṇa / asyāṃ tu punaḥ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau svabuddhigocaravicārapratilambhādasaṃhāryaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhairbhavati /
S04bsu014_u:108_6: tadyathāpi nāma bhavanto jinaputrā rājakulaprasūto rājaputro rājalakṣaṇasamanvāgato jātamātra eva sarvāmātyagaṇamabhibhavati rājādhipatyena,
S04bsu014_u:108_7: na punaḥ svabuddhivicāreṇa / yadā punaḥ sa saṃvṛddho bhavati tadā svabuddhibalādhānataḥ sarvāmātyakriyāsamatikrānto bhavati,
S04bsu014_u:108_9: na punaḥ svabuddhivicāreṇa / asyāṃ tu saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattvaḥ svaviṣayajñānaviśeṣamāhātmyāvasthitatvātsarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhakriyāmatikrānto bhavati /
S04bsu014_u:109_0: sa khalu punarbho bodhisattvo 'syāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito gambhīrasya vivittasyāpracārasya kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇo lābhī bhavati /
S04bsu014_u:110_0: vimukticandra āha - katamāṃ bhūmimupādāya bodhisattvo nirodhaṃ samāpadyate? vajragarbha āha - ṣaṣṭhīṃ bho jinaputra bodhisattvabhūmimupādāya bodhisattvo nirodhaṃ samāpadyate /
S04bsu014_u:110_1: asyāṃ [Dbh_40] punaḥ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvaścittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe nirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca /
S04bsu014_u:110_2: na ca nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛta iti vaktavyaḥ /
S04bsu014_u:110_3: tena so 'cintyena kāyavāṅmana skarmaṇā samanvāgata ityucyate /
S04bsu014_u:110_4: āścaryaṃ bho yatra hi nāma bodhisattvo bhūtakoṭivihāreṇa ca viharati,
S04bsu014_u:110_6: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra puruṣaḥ kuśalo mahāsāgare vārilakṣaṇābhijñaḥ paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī tatropagatayā mīmāṃsayā samanvāgato mahāsāgare mahāyānapātrābhirūḍho vahanakuśalaśca bhavati,
S04bsu014_u:110_7: vārikuśalaśca bhavati, na ca mahāsamudre vāridoṣairlipyate,
S04bsu014_u:110_8: evameva bho jinaputra asyāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñajñānamahāsāgarāvatīrṇaḥ pāramitāmahāyānapātrābhirūḍho bhūtakoṭivihāreṇa ca viharati,
S04bsu014_u:111_0: sa evaṃ jñānabalādhānaprāptaḥ samādhijñānabalabhāvanābhinirhṛtayā buddhyā mahatopāyaprajñābalādhānena saṃsāramukhaṃ cādarśayati /
S04bsu014_u:111_6: upāyena ca jvalati / jvalaṃśca na dahate / saṃvartate ca buddhajñānena /
S04bsu014_u:112_0: tasyaivaṃ jñānasamanvāgatasya asyāṃ saptasyāṃ dūraṃgamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya bahavo buddhā ābhāsamāgacchanti .
S04bsu014_u:112_2: teṣāṃ ca sakāśādgauravacitrīkāreṇa satkṛtya dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇoti,
S04bsu014_u:112_3: udgṛhṇāti dhārayati / śrutvā ca yathāvatsamāpattiprajñājñānālokena prayujyate /
S04bsu014_u:112_4: pratipattitaścādhārayati / śāsanasaṃdhārakaśca bhavati teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ mahātmanām /
S04bsu014_u:112_8: pariśuddhyanti, karmaṇyāni ca bhavanti, paryavadānaṃ cāgacchanti / anekāni kalpaśatāni ... anekāni kalpakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi tāni kuśalamūlānyuttapyante,
S04bsu014_u:112_9: pariśuddhyanti, karmaṇyāni ca bhavanti, paryavadānaṃ cāgacchanti / tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrāḥ tadeva jātarūpaṃ sarvaratnapratyuptaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayottaptataraṃ bhavati,
S04bsu014_u:112_10: prabhāsvarataraṃ bhavati, asaṃhāryataraṃ ca bhavatyanyābhyo bhūṣaṇavikṛtibhyaḥ,
S04bsu014_u:112_11: evameva bho jinaputrāḥ ... tāni kuśalamūlānyupāyaprajñājñānābhinirhṛtāni bhūyasyā mātrayottaptatarāṇi [Dbh_41] bhavanti prabhāsvaratarāṇi,
S04bsu014_u:112_13: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrāḥ sūryābhā asaṃhāryā bhavanti sarvajyotirgaṇacandrābhābhiścaturṣu mahādvīpeṣu,
S04bsu014_u:112_15: sarvaśasyāni paripācayanti, evameva bho jinaputrā ... tāni kuśalamūlānyasaṃhāryāṇi bhavanti sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ,
S04bsu014_u:112_18: tasya daśabhyaḥ pāramitābhya upāyakauśalyapāramitā atiriktatamā bhavati,
S04bsu014_u:112_19: na ca pariśeṣā na samudāgacchati yathābalaṃ yathābhajamānam /
S04bsu014_u:112_20: iyaṃ bho jinaputrā bodhisattvasya dūraṃgamā nāma saptamī bodhisattvabhūmiḥ samāsanirdeśataḥ,
S04bsu014_u:112_21: yasyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo bhūyastvena vaśavartī bhavati devarājaḥ kṛtī prabhuḥ sattvānāmabhisamayajñānopasaṃhāreṣvaparyantaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaparipṛcchāsu kuśalaḥ sattvānniyāmamavakrāmayitum /
S04bsu014_u:115_0: vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - yo 'yaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvaḥ saptasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu sukṛtavicayaḥ prajñopāyābhyāṃ supariśodhitamārgaḥ susaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ suparibaddhamahāpraṇidhānaḥ adhiṣṭhitatathāgatādhiṣṭhānaḥ svakuśalamūlabalādhānaprāptaḥ tathāgatabalavaiśāradyāveṇikabuddhadharmānugatasaṃjñāmanasikāraḥ supariśodhitādhyāśayasaṃkalpa puṇyajñānabalābhyudgataḥ mahākaruṇākṛpābhyāṃ sarvasattvānutsṛṣṭaprayogaḥ apramāṇajñānapathānugataḥ,
S04bsu014_u:115_2: ajātatāṃ ca alakṣaṇatāṃ ca asaṃbhūtatāṃ ca avināśitāṃ ca aniṣṭhitatāṃ ca apravṛttitāṃ ca anabhinivṛttitāṃ ca abhāvasvabhāvatāṃ ca ādimadhyaparyavasānasamatāṃ ca tathatāvikalpasarvajñajñānapraveśatāṃ ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtamavatarati /
S04bsu014_u:116_0: tatra bhavanto jinaputrā evaṃ kṣāntisamanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ sahapratilambhādacalāyā bodhisattvabhūmergambhīraṃ bodhisattvavihāramanuprāpto bhavati durājñātamasaṃbhinnaṃ sarvanimittāpagataṃ sarvasaṃjñāgrahavyāvṛttamapramāṇamasaṃhāryaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ sarvavivekābhimukhībhūtam /
S04bsu014_u:116_1: tadyathāpi nāma bhavanto jinaputrā bhikṣurṛddhimāṃścetovaśipāramitāprāpto 'nupūrveṇa navamaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpannaḥ sarveñjitamanyanāspanditavikalpāpagato bhavati,
S04bsu014_u:116_2: evameva bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvo 'syā aṣṭamyā acalāyā bodhisattvabhūmeḥ sahapratilambhātsarvābhogavigato 'nābhogadharmatāprāptaḥ kāyavākcittautsukyāpagataḥ sarveñjitamanyanāspanditavikalpāpagato vipākadharmatāvasthito bhavati /
S04bsu014_u:116_3: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrāḥ puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragato mahaughaprāptamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte /
S04bsu014_u:116_7: evameva bho jinaputrā bodhisattvaścaturmahaughaprāptaṃ sattvakāyaṃ saṃjānāna uttaraṇābhiprāyaḥ sarvajñajñānābhisaṃbodhāya mahadvyāyāmautsukyamārabhate /
S04bsu014_u:116_8: sa mahāvīryārambhaprāptaḥ samanantaramanuprāpta imāmacalāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ sarvābhogavigato bhavati /
S04bsu014_u:116_9: tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ dvayasamudācāro vā nimittasamudācāro vā nābhāsībhavati /
S04bsu014_u:116_10: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrā brahmalokopapattisthitaḥ kāmāvacarān kleśān na samudācarati,
S04bsu014_u:116_11: evameva bho jinaputrā bodhisattvo 'calāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitaḥ sarvacittamanovijñānasamudācārānna samudācarati /
S04bsu014_u:116_13: .. śrāvakasamudācāramapi ... nirvāṇasamudācāramapi ... arhatsamudācāramapi ... anāgāmisamudācāramapi ... nirvāṇasamudācāramapi ... arhatsamudācāramapi ... anāgāmisamudācāramapi ... sakṛdāgāmisamudācāramapi ... srotaāpannasamudācāramapi na samudācarati /
S04bsu014_u:117_1: tasya khalu bho jinaputra bodhisattvasya evamimāmacalāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanugatasya pūrvapraṇidhānabalādhānasthitasya buddhā bhagavantastasmin dharmamukhasrotasi tathāgatajñānopasaṃhāraṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu014_u:117_2: evaṃ cainaṃ bruvanti - sādhu sādhu kulaputra /
S04bsu014_u:117_4: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra yā asmākaṃ daśabalacaturvaiśāradyabuddhadharmasamṛddhiḥ,
S04bsu014_u:117_5: sā tava nāsti / tasyā buddhadharmasamṛddheḥ paryeṣaṇāya abhiyogaṃ kuru,
S04bsu014_u:117_7: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra kiṃcāpi tvayaivaṃ śāntavimokṣavihāro 'nuprāptaḥ,
S04bsu014_u:117_8: imān punaraśāntānapraśāntān bālapṛthagjanān nānākleśasamudācāraprāptān vividhavitarkopahatamānasān samanvāhara,
S04bsu014_u:117_9: apekṣasva / api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra pūrvapraṇidhānamanusmara sattvārthasaṃprāpaṇaṃ jñānamukhācintyatāṃ ca /
S04bsu014_u:117_10: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra eṣā sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā /
S04bsu014_u:117_11: utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaivaiṣā dharmatā dharmadhātusthitiḥ yadidaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatā sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ /
S04bsu014_u:117_14: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra prekṣasva tāvat tvamasmākaṃ kāyāpramāṇatāṃ ca jñānāpramāṇatāṃ ca buddhakṣetrāpramāṇatāṃ ca jñānābhinirhārāpramāṇatāṃ ca prabhāmaṇḍalāpramāṇatāṃ ca svarāṅgaviśuddhyapramāṇatāṃ ca /
S04bsu014_u:117_16: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra ekastveṣa āloko yo 'yaṃ sarvadharmanirvikalpālokaḥ /
S04bsu014_u:117_18: yeṣāṃ saṃkhyā nāsti, gaṇanā pramāṇamupaniṣadaupamyaṃ nāsti,
S04bsu014_u:117_20: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra prekṣasva tāvaddaśasu dikṣu apramāṇakṣetratāṃ ca apramāṇasattvatāṃ ca apramāṇadharmavibhaktitāṃ ca /
S04bsu014_u:117_22: iti hi bho jinaputra te buddhā bhagavanta evaṃbhūmyanugatasya bodhisattvasya evaṃ pramukhānyaprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni jñānābhinirhāramukhānyupasaṃharanti,
S04bsu014_u:118_0: ārocayāmi te bho jinaputra, prativedayāmi / te cedbuddhā bhagavantastaṃ bodhisattvamevaṃ sarvajñajñānābhinirhāramukheṣu nāvatārayeyuḥ,
S04bsu014_u:118_2: tena khalu punarbuddhā bhagavantastasya bodhisattvasya tāvadapramāṇaṃ jñānābhinirhārakarmopasaṃharanti,
S04bsu014_u:118_3: yasyaikakṣaṇābhinirhṛtasya jñānābhinirhārakarmaṇaḥ sa pūrvakaḥ prathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvatsaptamīṃ bhūmipratiṣṭhāmupāgata ārambhaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopeti,
S04bsu014_u:118_4: sahasratamīmapi, śatasahasratamīmapi ... peyālaṃ ... koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīmapi kalāṃ nopeti,
S04bsu014_u:118_5: saṃkhyāmapi, gaṇanāmapi, upamāmapi, upanisāmapi, yāvadaupamyamapi na kṣamate /
S04bsu014_u:118_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bho jinaputra pūrvamekakāyābhinirhāratayā caryābhinirhāro 'bhūt /
S04bsu014_u:118_7: imāṃ punarbhūmiṃ samārūḍhasya bodhisattvasya apramāṇakāyavibhaktito bodhisattvacaryābalaṃ samudāgacchati /
S04bsu014_u:118_8: apramāṇaghoṣābhinirhārataḥ apramāṇajñānābhinirhārataḥ apramāṇopapattyabhinirhārataḥ apramāṇakṣetrapariśodhanataḥ apramāṇasattvaparipācanataḥ [Dbh_44] apramāṇabuddhapūjopasthānataḥ apramāṇadharmakāyānubodhataḥ apramāṇābhijñābalādhānābhinirhārataḥ apramāṇaparṣanmaṇḍalavibhaktyabhinirhārataśca apramāṇānugatena kāyavāṅmanaskarmābhinirhāreṇa sarvabodhisattvacaryābalaṃ samudāgacchatyavicālyayogena /
S04bsu014_u:118_9: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra mahāsamudragāmī poto 'prāpto mahāsamudraṃ sābhogavāhano bhavati /
S04bsu014_u:118_10: sa eva samanantaramanuprāpto mahāsamudramanābhogavāhano vātamaṇḍalīpraṇīto yadekadivasena mahāsamudre kramate,
S04bsu014_u:118_12: evameva bho jinaputra bodhisattvaḥ susaṃbhṛtamahākuśalamūlasaṃbhāro mahāyānasamudāgamābhirūḍho mahābodhisattvacaryāsāgaramanuprāpto yadekamuhūrtena jñānānābhogatayā sarvajñajñānenākramati,
S04bsu014_u:118_13: tanna śakyaṃ pūrvakeṇa sābhogakarmaṇā kalpaśatasahasreṇāpi tāvadaprameyamanuprāptum /
S04bsu014_u:118_14: tatra bho jinaputra bodhisattvo 'ṣṭamīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanuprāpto mahatyā upāyakauśalyajñānābhinirhārānābhogaprasṛtayā bodhisattvabuddhyā sarvajñajñānaṃ vicārayan lokadhātusaṃbhavaṃ ca vicārayati,
S04bsu014_u:118_17: taṃ ca prajānāti / yathā ca loko vivartate, ... / yena ca karmopacayena lokaḥ saṃvartate,
S04bsu014_u:118_24: sa pṛthivīdhātuparīttatāṃ ca prajānāti mahadgatatāṃ ca .
S04bsu014_u:118_25: .. apramāṇatāṃ ca ... vibhaktitāṃ ca prajānāti / abdhātu ... / tejodhātu ... / vāyudhātu ... / sa paramāṇurajaḥsūkṣmatāṃ ca prajānāti,
S04bsu014_u:118_26: mahadgatatāṃ ca apramāṇatāṃ ca vibhaktitāṃ ca prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:118_28: asyāṃ ca lokadhātau yāvanti pṛthivīdhātoḥ paramāṇurajāṃsi tāni prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:118_29: yāvanti abdhātoḥ ... / tejodhātoḥ ... / vāyudhātoḥ ... / yāvantyo ratnavibhaktayo yāvanti ca ratnaparamāṇurajāṃsi tāni prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:118_30: sattvakāya ... / kṣetrakāya ... / sa sattvānāṃ kāyaudārikatāṃ ca kāyasūkṣmatāṃ ca kāyavibhaktitāṃ ca prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:118_32: ... . / devalokakāyāśrayataḥ ... . / manuṣyalokakāyāśrayataḥ ... . / sa evaṃ paramāṇurajaḥprabhedajñānāvatīrṇaḥ kāmadhātusaṃvartaṃ ca prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:118_34: rūpadhātuparīttatāṃ ... . ārūpyadhātuparīttatāṃ ... / āmadhātuparīttatāṃ ca mahadgatatāṃ ca apramāṇatāṃ ca vibhaktitāṃ ca prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:118_35: rūpadhātuparīttatāṃ ... ārūpyadhātuparīttataṃ ... / kāmadhātuparīttatāṃ ca mahadgatatāṃ ca apramāṇatāṃ ca vibhaktitāṃ ca prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:118_37: .. / traidhātukavicārajñānānugame svabhinirhṛtajñānālokaḥ sattvakāyaprabhedajñānakuśalaḥ kṣetrakāyavibhāgajñānakuśalaśca sattvopapattyāyatanābhinirhāre buddhiṃ cārayati /
S04bsu014_u:118_40: sa ekāmapi trisāhasramahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ [Dbh_45] spharitvā sattvānāṃ svakāyaṃ vibhaktyadhimuktiṣu tathatvāyopapattaye 'bhinirharati pratibhāsajñānānugamanatayā (yathā sattvāḥ paripākaṃ gacchantyanuttarasamyaksaṃbodhivimuktaye) /
S04bsu014_u:118_41: evaṃ dve vā tisro vā catasro vā pañca vā daśa vā viṃśatirvā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā yāvadanabhilāpyā api trisāhasramahāsāhasrā lokadhātūḥ spharitvā sattvānāṃ svakāyaṃ .
S04bsu014_u:118_43: sa evaṃjñānasamanvāgato 'syāṃ bhūmau supratiṣṭhita ekabuddhakṣetrācca na calati,
S04bsu014_u:118_44: anabhilāpyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tathāgataparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu ca pratibhāsaprāpto bhavati /
S04bsu014_u:119_0: yādṛśī sattvānāṃ kāyavibhaktiśca varṇaliṅgasaṃsthānārohapariṇāhādhimuktyadhyāśayaśca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu teṣu ca parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu tatra tatra tathā tathā svakāyamādarśayati /
S04bsu014_u:119_3: kṣatriya ... / vaiśya ... / śūdra ... / gṛhapati ... / cāturmahārājika ... / trāyastriṃśa ... / evaṃ yāma ... / tuṣita ... / nirmāṇarati ... / paranirmitavaśavarti ... / māra ... / brahma ... / yāvadakaniṣṭha ... / śrāvakavaineyikānāṃ sattvānāṃ śrāvakakāyavarṇarūpamādarśayati /
S04bsu014_u:119_5: bodhisattva ... / tathāgata ... / iti hi bho jinaputra yāvanto 'nabhilāpyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvānāmupapattyāyatanādhimuktiprasarāsteṣu tathatvāya svakāyavibhaktimādarśayati /
S04bsu014_u:120_0: sa sarvakāyavikalpāpagataḥ kāyasamatāprāptaḥ (taccāsya kāyasaṃdarśanamakṣūṇamavandhyaṃ ca sattvaparipākavinayāya) sa sattvakāyaṃ ca prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:120_1: kṣetrakāyaṃ ca ... / karmavipākakāyaṃ ca ... / śrāvakakāyaṃ ca ... / pratyekabuddhakāyaṃ ca ... / bodhisattvakāyaṃ ca ... / tathāgatakāyaṃ ca ... / jñānakāyaṃ ca ... / dharmakāyaṃ ca ... / ākāśakāyaṃ ca prajānāti / sa sattvānāṃ cittāśayābhinirhāramājñāya yathākālaparipākavinayānatikramādākāṅkṣan sattvakāyaṃ svakāyamadhitiṣṭhati /
S04bsu014_u:120_3: .. ātmakāyamadhitiṣṭhati / sa sattvānāṃ cittāśayābhinirhāramājñāya yaṃ yameva kāyaṃ yasmin yasmin kāye ākāṅkṣati,
S04bsu014_u:120_4: taṃ tameva kāyaṃ tasmin tasmin kāye (svakāyaṃ) adhitiṣṭhati /
S04bsu014_u:120_6: vipākakāyatāṃ ca ... / kleśakāyatāṃ ca ... / rūpakāyatāṃ ca ... / ārūpyakāyatāṃ ca prajānāti / kṣetrakāyānāṃ parīttatāṃ ca prajānāti,
S04bsu014_u:120_7: mahadgatatāṃ ca apramāṇatāṃ ca saṃkliṣṭatāṃ ca viśuddhatāṃ ca vyatyastatāṃ ca adhomūrdhatāṃ ca samatalatāṃ ca samavasaraṇatāṃ ca digjālavibhāgatāṃ ca prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:120_9: evaṃ śrāvakākāyānāṃ pratyekabuddhakāyānāṃ bodhisattvakāyānāṃ vibhaktisaṃketaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:120_11: praṇidhānakāyatāṃ ca ... / nirmāṇakāyatāṃ ca / adhiṣṭhānakāyatāṃ ca / rūpalakṣaṇānuvyañjanavicitrālaṃkārakāyatāṃ ca /
S04bsu014_u:120_12: prabhākāyatāṃ ca / manomayakāyatāṃ ca / puṇyakāyatāṃ ca / jñānakāyatāṃ ca / dharmakāyatāṃ ca prajānāti / jñānakāyānāṃ suvicāritatāṃ ca prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:120_13: yathāvannistīraṇatāṃ ca phalaprayogasaṃgṛhītatāṃ [Dbh_46] ca laukikalokottaravibhāgatāṃ ca triyāṇavyavasthānatāṃ ca sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇatāṃ ca nairyāṇikānairyāṇikatāṃ ca śaikṣāśaikṣatāṃ ca prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:120_15: avikopanatāṃ ca avasthānasaṃketasaṃvṛttivyavasthānatāṃ ca sattvāsattvadharmavyavasthānatāṃ ca buddhadharmāryasaṃghavyavasthānatāṃ ca prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:120_16: ākāśakāyānāmapramāṇatāṃ ca sarvatrānugatatāṃ ca aśarīratāṃ ca avitathānantatāṃ ca rūpakāyābhivyaktitāṃ ca prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:121_0: sa evaṃ kāyajñānābhinirhāraprāpto vaśavartī bhavati sarvasattveṣu /
S04bsu014_u:121_5: upapattivaśitāṃ ca sarvalokadhātūpapattisaṃdarśanatayā adhimuktisaṃdarśanatayā sarvalokadhātubuddhapratipūrṇasaṃdarśanatayā praṇidhānasaṃdarśanatayā yatheṣṭabuddhakṣetrakālābhisaṃbodhisaṃdarśanatayā ṛddhisaṃdarśanatayā sarvabuddhakṣetra-ṛddhivikurvaṇasaṃdarśanatayā dharmasaṃdarśanatayā anantamadhyadharmamukhālokasaṃdarśanatayā jñānasaṃdarśanatayā tathāgatabalavaiśāradyāveṇikabuddhadharmalakṣaṇānuvyañjanābhisaṃbodhisaṃdarśanatayā /
S04bsu014_u:122_0: sa āsāṃ daśānāṃ bodhisattvavaśitānāṃ sahapratilambhena acintyajñānī ca bhavati atulyajñānī ca aprameyajñānī ca vipulajñānī ca asaṃhāryajñānī ca bhavati /
S04bsu014_u:122_1: tasyaivaṃbhūmyanugatasya evaṃ jñānasamanvāgatasya atyantāgavadyaḥ kāyakarmasamudācāraḥ pravartate,
S04bsu014_u:122_4: samāsato bho jinaputra bodhisattvasya imāmacalāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanuprāptasya sarvabuddhadharmasamudānayanāya kāyavāṅmanaskarmasamudācāraḥ pravartate /
S04bsu014_u:122_5: sa evamimāmacalāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanuprāptaḥ supratiṣṭhitāśayabalaśca bhavati sarvakleśasamudācārāpagatatvāt /
S04bsu014_u:123_0: iyaṃ bho jinaputra bodhisattvasya aṣṭamī jñānabhūmiracaletyucyate 'saṃhāryatvāt /
S04bsu014_u:124_0: evaṃ jñānasvabhinirhṛtaḥ khalu punarbho jinaputra bodhisattvo buddhagotrānugato buddhaguṇaprabhāvabhāsitastathāgateryāpathacaryācāritrānugato buddhaviṣayābhimukhaḥ satatasamitaṃ svadhiṣṭhitatathāgatādhiṣṭhānaśca bhavati śakrabrahmalokapālapratyudgataśca vajrapāṇisatatānubaddhaśca samādhibalānutsṛṣṭaśca ca apramāṇakāyavibhaktyabhinirhṛtaśca sarvakāyacaryābalopagataśca mahābhijñāvipākapariniṣpannaśca anantasamādhivaśavartī ca apramāṇavyākaraṇapratyeṣakaśca yathāparipavakkajagadabhisaṃbodhinidarśakaśca bhavati /
S04bsu014_u:124_1: sa evaṃ jñānabhūmyanugato mahāyānamaṇḍalānupraviṣṭaḥ suvicāritamahājñānābhijñaḥ satatasamitaṃ pramuktaprajñālokaraśmirasaṅgadharmadhātupathāvatīrṇo lokadhātupathavibhaktikovidaḥ sarvākāraguṇasaṃdarśakaḥ svacittotpādavaśavartī pūrvāntāparāntasuvicitajñānaḥ sarvamārapathāvartanavivartanajñānānugataḥ sarvatathāgataviṣayagocarānupraviṣṭo 'paryantalokadhātuprasareṣu bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratyapratyudāvartyayogena /
S04bsu014_u:125_0: tatra bho jinaputra acalāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanuprāpto bodhisattvaḥ satatasamitamaparyantatathāgatadarśanāvirahito bhavati samādhibalasvabhinirhṛtatvāt /
S04bsu014_u:125_2: sa ekaikasmin kalpe ekaikasmin lokadhātuprasare anekān buddhān,
S04bsu014_u:125_3: anekāni buddhaśatāni ... peyālaṃ ... anekāni buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati sarvākārapūjābhinirhāraṃ copasaṃharati /
S04bsu014_u:125_6: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā tathāgatadharmakośaprāpto 'saṃhāryo bhavati lokadhātuparipṛcchānirdeśeṣu /
S04bsu014_u:125_8: .. / tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra tadeva jātarūpaṃ supariniṣṭhitaṃ kuśalena karmāreṇa suparikarmakṛtaṃ jambūdvīpasvāminaḥ kaṇṭhe śirasi vā ābaddhamasaṃhāryaṃ bhavati sarvajambūdvīpakānāṃ sattvānāmābharaṇavikṛtaiḥ,
S04bsu014_u:125_9: evameva bho jinaputra asyāmacalāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya tāni kuśalamūlānyasaṃhāryāṇi bhavanti sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhairyāvatsaptamībhūmisthitaiśca bodhisattvaiḥ /
S04bsu014_u:125_10: imāṃ ca bhūmimanugatasya bodhisattvasya mahatī prajñājñānaprabhā sattvānāṃ kleśatamāṃsi praśamayati suvibhaktajñānamukhābhinirhāratayā /
S04bsu014_u:125_11: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra sāhasriko mahābrahmā sāhasralokadhātuṃ [Dbh_48] maitryā spharitvā prabhayāvabhāsayati,
S04bsu014_u:125_12: evameva bho jinaputra bodhisattvo 'syāmacalāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito yāvaddaśabuddhakṣetraśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūn mahatā maitryavabhāsena spharitvā sattvānāṃ kleśaparidāhānanupūrveṇa praśamayati,
S04bsu014_u:125_13: āśrayāṃśca prahlādayati / tasya daśabhyaḥ pāramitābhyaḥ praṇidhānapāramitā atiriktatamā bhavati,
S04bsu014_u:125_14: na ca pariśeṣāsu na samudāgacchati yathābalaṃ yathābhajamānam /
S04bsu014_u:125_15: iyaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvasya acalā nāma aṣṭamī bodhisattvabhūmiḥ samāsanirdeśataḥ /
S04bsu014_u:125_17: yasyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo bhūyastvena mahābrahmā bhavati
S04bsu014_u:125_18: sāhasrādhipatiḥ / abhibhūranabhibhūto 'nvarthadarśī vaśiprāptaḥ kṛtī prabhuḥ sattvānāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvapāramitopadeśopasaṃhāreṣu asaṃhāryo lokadhātuvibhaktiparipṛcchānirdeśeṣu /
S04bsu014_u:128_0: vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - yo 'yaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattva evamapramāṇajñeyavicāritayā buddhyā bhūyaścottarān śāntān vimokṣānadhyavasyan adhyālambamānaḥ bhūyaścottaraṃ tathāgatajñānaṃ susamāptaṃ vicārayan tathāgataguhyānupraveśaṃ cāvataran acintyajñānamāhātmyaṃ ca pravicinvan dhāraṇīsamādhipravicayaṃ ca pariśodhayan abhijñāvaipulyaṃ cābhinirharan lokadhātuvibhaktiṃ cānugacchan tathāgatabalavaiśādyāveṇikabuddhadharmāsaṃhāryatāṃ ca parikarmayan tathāgatadharmacakrapravartanavṛṣabhatāṃ cānukramamāṇaḥ mahākaruṇādhiṣṭhānapratilambhaṃ cānutsṛjan navamīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimākramati /
S04bsu014_u:128_1: so 'syāṃ sādhumatyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitaḥ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtadharmābhisaṃskāraṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:129_0: sa evaṃjñānānugatayā buddhyā sattvacittagahanopacāraṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:129_1: kleśagahanopacāraṃ ca ... / karmagahanopacāraṃ ca ... / indriyagahanopacāraṃ ca ... / adhimuktigahanopacāraṃ ca ... / dhātugahanopacāraṃ ca ... / āśayānuśayagahanopacāraṃ ca .
S04bsu014_u:129_4: sa sattvānāṃ cittavaimātratāṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:129_5: cittavicitratāṃ ca cittakṣaṇalaghuparivartabhaṅgabhaṅgatāṃ ca cittaśarīratāṃ ca cittānantyasarvataḥprabhūtatāṃ ca cittaprabhāsvaratāṃ ca cittasaṃkleśaniḥkleśatāṃ ca cittabandhavimokṣatāṃ ca cittamāyāviṭhapanatāṃ ca cittayathāgatipratyupasthānatāṃ ca yāvadanekāni cittanānātvasahasrāṇi yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:129_6: sa kleśānāṃ dūrānugatatāṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:129_7: prayogānantatāṃ ca ... / sahajāvinirbhāgatāṃ ca ... / anuśayaparyutthānaikārthatāṃ ca .
S04bsu014_u:129_19: .. / yānāyānaniyatāniyatatāṃ ca ... / samāsato yāvaccaturaśītikarmanānātvasahasrapravibhaktivicayakauśalyaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:129_31: sa dhātūnāṃ ... . / sa āśayānāṃ ... . / so 'nuśayānāmāśayasahajacittasahajatāṃ ca .
S04bsu014_u:129_40: sa upapattinānātvatāṃ ca / yathākarmopapattitāṃ ca / nirayatiryagyonipretāsuramanuṣyadevavyavasthānatāṃ ca /
S04bsu014_u:129_55: sa sattvarāśīnāṃ samyaktvaniyatatāṃ ca prajānāti mithyātvaniyatatāṃ ca /
S04bsu014_u:129_57: .. niyatatāṃ ca / tadubhayavigamādaniyatatāṃ ca pañcānantaryānyatamamithyādṛṣṭiniyatatāṃ ca .
S04bsu014_u:129_64: iti hi bho jinaputra evaṃjñānānugato bodhisattvaḥ sādhumatyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhita ityucyate /
S04bsu014_u:130_0: so 'syāṃ sādhumatyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthita evaṃ caryāvimātratāṃ sattvānāmajñāya tathaiva mokṣopasaṃhāramupasaṃharati /
S04bsu014_u:130_2: sattvavinayaṃ ca ... / śrāvakayānadeśanāṃ ca / pratyekabuddhayānadeśanāṃ ca /
S04bsu014_u:130_4: sa evaṃ jñātvā tathatvāya sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu014_u:130_5: yathāśayavibhaktito yathānuśayavibhaktito yathendriyavibhaktito [Dbh_51] yathādhimuktivibhaktito yathāgocaravibhāgajñānopasaṃhārataḥ sarvagocarajñānānugamanato yathādhātugahanopacārānugamanato yathāgatyupapattikleśakarmavāsanānuvartanato yathārāśivyavasthānānugamanato yathāyānādhimokṣavimuktiprāptito 'nantavarṇarūpakāyasaṃdarśanataḥ sarvalokadhātumanojñasvaravijñāpanataḥ sarvarutaravitaparijñānataḥ sarvapratisaṃvidviniścayakauśalyataśca dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu014_u:131_0: so 'syāṃ sādhumatyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitaḥ san bodhisattvo dharmabhāṇakatvaṃ kārayati,
S04bsu014_u:131_2: sa dharmābhāṇakagatimupagato 'pramāṇajñānānugatena kauśalyena catuḥpratisaṃvidabhinirhṛtayā bodhisattvavācā dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu014_u:131_4: katamāścatasraḥ? yaduta dharmapratisaṃvit arthapratisaṃvit niruktipratisaṃvit pratibhānapratisaṃvit /
S04bsu014_u:141_1: arthapratisaṃvidā caturaśītisattvacaritasahasrāṇāṃ yathāśayaṃ yathendriyaṃ yathādhimuktivibhaktitastathāgataghoṣaṃ prajānati /
S04bsu014_u:142_0: sa evaṃ pratisaṃvidā jñānābhinirhārakuśalo bho jinaputra bodhisattvo navamīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanuprāptastathāgatadharmakośaprāpto mahādharmabhāṇakatvaṃ ca kurvāṇaḥ arthavatīdhāraṇīpratilabdhaśca bhavati /
S04bsu014_u:142_1: dharmavatī ... / jñānābhinirhāravatī ... / avabhāsavatī ... / vasumatīdhāraṇī ... / sumatidhāraṇī ... / tejodhāraṇī ... / asaṅgamukhadhāraṇī ... / ananta ... / vicitrārthakośa ... / sa evamādīnāṃ dhāraṇīpadānāṃ paripūrṇāni daśadhāraṇīmukhāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇi pratilabhate /
S04bsu014_u:142_2: tathā asaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrānugatenaiva svarāṅgakauśalyena tāvadapramāṇānugatenaiva pratibhānavibhaktimukhena dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu014_u:142_3: sa evamapramāṇairdhāraṇīmukhāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrairdaśasu dikṣu aprameyāṇāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśāddharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
S04bsu014_u:142_4: śrutvā ca na vismārayati / yathāśrutaṃ ca apramāṇavibhaktita evaṃ nirdiśati /
S04bsu014_u:143_3: na tveva mahābāhuśrutyaprāptaḥ śrāvakaḥ śrutodgrahaṇadhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ kalpaśatasahasrodgrahaṇādhiṣṭhānena /
S04bsu014_u:143_4: sa evaṃ dhāraṇīprāptaśca bhavati pratibhānaprāptaśca dharmasāṃkathyaṃ saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ sarvāvatīṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ spharitvā yathāśayavibhaktitaḥ sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati dharmāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
S04bsu014_u:143_5: dharmāsanaṃ cāsya tathāgatānabhiṣekabhūmiprāptān bodhisattvān sthāpayitvā sarvato viśiṣṭamapramāṇāvabhāsaprāptaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu014_u:143_6: sa dharmāsane niṣaṇṇa ākāṅkṣan ekaghoṣodāhāreṇa sarvaparṣadaṃ nānāghoṣarutavimātratayā saṃjñāpayati /
S04bsu014_u:143_10: ākāṅkṣan yāvattrisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau rūpāvabhāsāstebhyaḥ sarvarūpāvabhāsebhyo dharmarutāni niścārayati /
S04bsu014_u:143_15: ākāṅkṣan anabhilāpyānabhilāpyalokadhātvaparyantataḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyuskandhebhyaḥ sūkṣmaparamāṇurajaḥprabhedata ekaikaparamāṇurajonabhilāpyāni dharmamukhāni niścārayati /
S04bsu014_u:143_16: sacettaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparyāpannaḥ sarvasattvā upasaṃkramya ekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtena praśnān paripṛccheyuḥ,
S04bsu014_u:143_18: yaṃ caikaḥ sattvaḥ paripṛcchenna taṃ dvitīyaḥ,
S04bsu014_u:143_20: udgṛhya caikarutābhivyāhāreṇa teṣāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ cittāśayān paritoṣayet (yāvadanabhilāpyalokadhāturpayāpannā vā sattvā upasaṃkramya ekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtena praśnān paripṛccheyuḥ,
S04bsu014_u:143_23: taṃ bodhisattva ekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtenaiva sarvamudgṛhya ekodāhāreṇaiva sarvānājñāpayet /
S04bsu014_u:143_24: yāvadanabhilāpyānapi lokadhātūn spharitvā yathāśayendriyādhimuktitaḥ sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu014_u:143_25: dharmasāṃkathyaṃ niṣaṇṇaśca tathāgatādhiṣṭhānasaṃpratyeṣakaḥ sakalena buddhakāryeṇa sarvasattvānāṃ pratyupasthito bhavati /
S04bsu014_u:143_27: sacedekasmin vālāgraprasare yāvantyanabhilāpyeṣu lokadhātuṣu paramāṇurajāṃsi tāvantastathāgatāstāvadapramāṇaprāpteṣveva parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu dharmaṃ deśayeyuḥ /
S04bsu014_u:143_28: ekaikaśca tathāgatastāvadapramāṇaprāptebhyaḥ sarvasattvebhyo nānātvato dharmaṃ deśayet,
S04bsu014_u:143_30: yathā caikastathāgataḥ parṣanmaṇḍale tathā te sarve tathāgatāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:143_31: yathā caikasmin vālāgraprasare tathā sarvasmin dharmadhātau /
S04bsu014_u:143_32: tatrāsmābhistādṛśaṃ smṛtivaipulyamabhinirhartavyaṃ yathaikakṣaṇena sarvatathāgatānāṃ sakāśāddharmāvabhāsaṃ pratyeṣemahi ekarutāvyatirekāt /
S04bsu014_u:143_33: yāvanti ca tāni yathāparikīrtitāni parṣanmaṇḍalāni nānānikāyadharmapravaṇaikaparipūrṇāni,
S04bsu014_u:143_34: tatrāsmābhistādṛśaṃ prajñāvabhāsaviniścayapratibhānaṃ pariśodhyaṃ yadekakṣaṇena sarvasattvān paritoṣayet,
S04bsu014_u:144_0: sa imāṃ sādhumatīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanuprāpto bodhisattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā rātriṃdivamananyamanasikāraprayukto bhūtvā buddhagocarānupraviṣṭastathāgatasamavadhānaprāpto gambhīrabodhisattvavimokṣānuprāpto bhavati /
S04bsu014_u:144_1: sa evaṃjñānānugato bodhisattvaḥ samāhitastathāgatadarśanaṃ na vijahāti /
S04bsu014_u:144_4: .. / dṛṣṭvā ca satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati /
S04bsu014_u:144_8: tasya bhūyasyā mātrayā tāni kuśalamūlānyuttaptatamānyasaṃhāryāṇi bhavanti /
S04bsu014_u:144_9: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrāstadeva jātarūpamābharaṇīkṛtaṃ supariniṣṭhitaṃ kuśalena karmāreṇa rājñaścakravartina uttamāṅge kaṇṭhe vā ābaddhamasaṃhārya bhavati sarvakoṭṭarājānāṃ cāturdvipakānāṃ ca sattvānāmābharaṇavikṛtaiḥ,
S04bsu014_u:144_10: evameva bho jinaputrā bodhisattvasya asyāṃ sādhumatyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya tāni kuśalamūlāni mahājñānālokasuvibhaktānyuttapyante,
S04bsu014_u:144_12: tasya sā kuśalamūlābhā sattvānāṃ kleśacittagahanānyavabhāsya tata eva vyāvartate /
S04bsu014_u:144_13: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrā dvisāhasriko mahābrahmā sarvasmin dvisāhasrike lokadhātau gahananimnopacārānavabhāsayati,
S04bsu014_u:144_14: evameva bho jinaputrā bodhisattvasya asyāṃ sādhumatyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya sā kuśalamūlābhā sattvānāṃ kleśacittagahanānyavabhāsya tata eva vyāvartate /
S04bsu014_u:144_15: tasya daśabhyaḥ pāramitābhyo balapāramitā atiriktatamā bhavati,
S04bsu014_u:144_16: na ca pariśeṣāsu na samudācarati yathābalaṃ yathābhajamānam /
S04bsu014_u:144_17: iyaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvasya sādhumatī nāma navamī bodhisattvabhūmiḥ .
S04bsu014_u:147_0: vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - yo 'yaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattva evamapramāṇajñeyavicāritayā buddhyā yāvannavamī bodhisattvabhūmiriti suvicitavicayaḥ suparipūrṇaśukladharmaḥ paryantasaṃbhāropacayopacitaḥ suparigṛhītamahāpuṇyajñānasaṃbhāraḥ mahākaruṇāvaipulyādhigataḥ lokadhātuvibhaktivaimātryakovidaḥ sattvadhātupraviṣṭagahanopacāraḥ tathāgatagocarapraveśānugatasaṃjñāmanasikāraḥ balavaiśāradyabuddhadharmādhyālambanānugataḥ sarvākārasarvajñajñānābhiṣekabhūmiprāpta ityucyate /
S04bsu014_u:148_0: tasya khalu punarbhavanto jinaputrā evaṃjñānānugatasya bodhisattvasya abhiṣekabhūmisamāpannasya vimalo nāma samādhirāmukhībhavati /
S04bsu014_u:148_4: sāgaragarbhaśca nāma / sāgarasamṛddhiśca nāma / ākāśadhātuvipulaśca nāma / sarvadharmasvabhāvavicayaśca nāma /
S04bsu014_u:148_8: sa tān sarvān samādhīn samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca,
S04bsu014_u:149_0: yasmin samanantarābhimukhībhūte daśatrisāhasraśatasahasrāparyantapramāṇaṃ mahāratnarājapadmaṃ prādurbhavati sarvākārararatnapratyarpitaṃ sarvalokaviṣayasamatikrāntaṃ lokottarakuśalamūlasaṃbhūtaṃ māyāsvabhāvagocarapariniṣpannaṃ dharmadhātusuvyavasthitāvabhāsaṃ divyaviṣayasamatikrāntaṃ mahāvaiḍūryamaṇiratnadaṇḍamatulyacandanarājakarṇikaṃ mahāśmagarbhakesaraṃ jāmbūnadasuvarṇāvabhāsapatramaparimitaraśmisaṃkusumitaśarīraṃ sarvapravararatnapratyuptagarbhamaparyantamahāratnajālasaṃchannaṃ paripūrṇadaśatrisāhasraśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamamahāratnapadmaparivāram /
S04bsu014_u:149_2: sa tasya sarvajñajñānaviśeṣābhiṣekavataḥ samādheḥ sahapratilambhāttasminmahāratnarājapadme niṣaṇṇaḥ saṃdṛśyate /
S04bsu014_u:149_4: atha yāvanti tasya mahāratnarājapadmasya mahāpadmāni parivāraḥ prādurbhūtaḥ,
S04bsu014_u:149_5: tāvanto bodhisattvā daśadiglokadhātusaṃnipatitāstaṃ bodhisattvamanuparivārya teṣu mahāratnapadmeṣu niṣīdanti /
S04bsu014_u:149_6: ekaikaśca teṣāṃ daśa samādhiśatasahasrāṇi samāpadyate tameva bodhisattvaṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ /
S04bsu014_u:150_0: samanantarasamāpanne ca tasmin bodhisattve teṣu ca bodhisattveṣu niravaśeṣam,
S04bsu014_u:150_6: sarvasabhāgacaritabodhisattvasaṃnipātanaṃ [Dbh_56] ca sarvalokadhātudevamanuṣyatūryasaṃgītisaṃpravādanaṃ ca sarvasattvasukhasaṃjananaṃ ca sarvasamyaksaṃbuddhācintyapūjopasthānapravartanaṃ ca sarvatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalavijñāpanaṃ ca bhavati /
S04bsu014_u:150_7: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bho jinaputrāstasya bodhisattvasya samanantaraniṣaṇṇasya tasmin mahāratnarājapadme adhastāccaraṇatalābhyāṃ daśaraśmyasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti /
S04bsu014_u:150_23: niścarya daśasu dikṣu sarvamārabhavanānyavabhāsya dhyāmīkṛtya abhiṣekabhūmiprāptān bodhisattvān avabhāsya tatkāyeṣvevāstaṃ gacchanti /
S04bsu014_u:150_25: niścarya daśasu dikṣu dharmadhātupramāṇānyākāśadhātuparyavasānāni sarvatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalānyavabhāsya daśākāraṃ lokaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya uparikhagapathe sthitvā mahāraśmijālamaṇḍalāni
S04bsu014_u:150_28: .. / tataḥ khalvapi mahāraśmijālamaṇḍalādyāvatī daśasu dikṣu niravaśeṣasarvadharmadhātvantargatā puṣpaprajñaptirvā gandhadhūpamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvastrābharaṇamaṇiratnaprajñaptirvā,
S04bsu014_u:150_29: tato 'tiriktatarāḥ sarvalokaviṣayasamatikrāntā lokottarakuśalamūlasaṃbhārādhipatyābhinirvṛttāḥ sarvākāraguṇasaṃpannā acintyanirvāṇādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitā nānāvyūhamahāratnavarṣā iva ekaikatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍale mahāmeghā ivābhipravarṣanti sma /
S04bsu014_u:150_30: tāṃ ca ye sattvāḥ pūjāṃ saṃjānante,
S04bsu014_u:150_32: evaṃrūpaṃ pūjopasthānaṃ pravartya tā raśmayaḥ punareva sarvāvanti tathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalānyavabhāsya daśākāraṃ lokaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmadhastātkramataleṣu astaṃ gacchanti /
S04bsu014_u:150_33: tatasteṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ viditaṃ bhavati - amuṣmin lokadhātuprasare evaṃcaryānugato bodhisattvo 'bhiṣekakālaprāpta iti /
S04bsu014_u:150_34: tatra bho jinaputrā daśabhyo digbhyo 'paryantebhyo lokadhātuprasarebhyo 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyāparyantā bodhisattvā yāvannavamībodhisattvabhūmipratiṣṭhitā āgatya taṃ bodhisattvamanuparivārya mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tameva bodhisattvaṃ [Dbh_57] nirīkṣamāṇā daśa samādhiśatasahasrāṇi samāpadyante /
S04bsu014_u:150_35: abhiṣekabhūmiprāptānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ kāyebhyaḥ śrīvatsālaṃkārādvajrasvastikāt sarvamāraśatruvijayo nāmaikaikā mahāraśmirdaśaraśmyasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasraparivārā niścarati,
S04bsu014_u:150_36: niścarya daśadiśo 'vabhāsya aparyantāni prātihāryāṇi saṃdarśya tasya bodhisattvasya śrīvatsālaṃkāre vajrasvastika evāstaṃ gacchati /
S04bsu014_u:150_37: samanantarādastamitāyāśca tasyā raśmyāḥ śatasahasraguṇottarā tasya bodhisattvasya balasthāmābhivṛddhiḥ prajñāyate /
S04bsu014_u:151_0: atha khalu bho jinaputrāḥ sarvajñatābhijñāvatyo nāma raśmayasteṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmūrṇākośebhyo niścarantyasaṃkhyeyaparivārāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:151_1: tāḥ sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu aśeṣataḥ sarvalokadhātūnavabhāsya daśākāraṃ lokaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya mahānti tathāgatavikurvitāni saṃdarśya bahūni bodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi saṃcodya sarvabuddhakṣetraprasarān ṣaḍvikāraṃ saṃprakampya sarvāpāyacyutigatyupapattīḥ praśamya sarvamārabhavanāni dhyāmīkṛtya sarvatathāgatābhisaṃbodhivibuddhabuddhāsanānyupasaṃdarśya sarvabuddhaparṣanmaṇḍalavyūhaprabhāvaṃ nidarśya dharmadhātuparamānākāśadhātuparyavasānān sarvalokadhātūnavabhāsya punarevāgatya taṃ sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvaparṣatsaṃnipātamuparyuparipradakṣiṇīkṛtya mahāvyuhānnidarśya tā raśmayastasya bodhisattvasyottamāṅge 'staṃ gacchanti /
S04bsu014_u:151_2: tatparivāraraśmayaśca tathā saṃnipatitānāṃ teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ śirassvantardhīyante sma /
S04bsu014_u:151_3: samanantarasaṃnipatitābhiśca tābhī raśmibhiste bodhisattvā apratilabdhapūrvāṇi daśa samādhiśatasahasrāṇi pratilabhante /
S04bsu014_u:151_4: tāśca raśmayastulyakālaṃ tasya bodhisattvasyottamāṅge nipatitā bhavanti /
S04bsu014_u:151_6: daśabalaparipūryā tu samyaksaṃbuddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
S04bsu014_u:151_7: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrā yo rājñaścakravartinaḥ putro jyeṣṭhaḥ kumāro 'gryamahiṣīprasūtaścakravartirājalakṣaṇasamanvāgato bhavati,
S04bsu014_u:151_8: taṃ rājā cakravartī divye hastisauvarṇe bhadrapīṭhe niṣādya,
S04bsu014_u:151_10: upariratnavimānena dhāryamāṇena mahatā puṣpadhūpagandhadīpamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākātūryatālāvacarasaṃgitivyūhena sauvarṇaṃ bhṛṅgāraṃ gṛhītvā tena vāriṇā taṃ kumāraṃ mūrdhanyabhiṣiñcati /
S04bsu014_u:151_11: samanantarābhiṣiktaśca rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhabhiṣikta iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
S04bsu014_u:151_14: samyaksaṃbuddhābhiṣekeṇa daśabalaparipūryā tu samyaksaṃbuddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
S04bsu014_u:151_15: ayaṃ bho jinaputrā bodhisattvasya mahājñānābhiṣeko yasyārthe bodhisattvo 'nekāni duṣkaraśatasahasrāṇyārabhate /
S04bsu014_u:151_16: sa evamabhiṣikto 'prameyaguṇajñānavivardhito dharmameghāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhita ityucyate /
S04bsu014_u:152_0: so 'syāṃ dharmameghāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo dharmadhātusamudāgamaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:152_20: sa evaṃjñānānugatayā buddhyā uttari sattvakāyanirmāṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:152_22: dṛṣṭikṛtanirmāṇaṃ ca ... lokadhātunirmāṇaṃ ca ... dharmadhātunirmāṇaṃ ca ... śrāvakanirmāṇaṃ ca ... pratyekabuddhanirmāṇaṃ ca ... bodhisattvanirmāṇaṃ ca ... tathāgatanirmāṇaṃ ca ... sarvanirmāṇakalpākalpatāṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:152_23: sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca ... dharmādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca ... saṃghādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca ... karmādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca kleśādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca .
S04bsu014_u:152_24: .. kālādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca ... praṇidhānādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca ... pūjādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca ... caryādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca ... kalpādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca ... jñānādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca prajānāti /
S04bsu014_u:152_25: sa yānīmāni tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sūkṣmapraveśajñānāni yaduta caryāsūkṣmapraveśajñānaṃ vā,
S04bsu014_u:152_46: sa yānīmāni tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ guhyasthānāni yaduta kāyaguhyaṃ vā vāgguhyaṃ vā cittaguhyaṃ vā kālākālavicāraṇāguhyaṃ vā bodhisattvavyākaraṇaguhyaṃ vā sattvasaṃgrahanigrahaguhyaṃ vā vineyotsādanāvasānaguhyaṃ vā yathākālāvavādānuśāsanādhyupekṣaṇaṃ vā yānanānātvavyavasthāpanaguhyaṃ vā sattvacaryendriyavibhaktiguhyaṃ vā sattvakarmakriyāvatāraguhyaṃ vā bodhisattvacaryendriyavibhaktiguhyaṃ vā caryābhisaṃbodhisvabhāvaprabhāvānubodhiguhyaṃ vā svabhāvābhisaṃbodhyadhiṣṭhānaguhyaṃ vā avatārottāraṇaguhyaṃ vā ākarṣaṇasaṃpreṣaṇaguhyaṃ vā sthānacaṃkramaṇaniṣadyāśayyāsanasaṃdarśanaguhyaṃ vā āhāraparibhogakāyopakaraṇapratisevanaguhyaṃ vā bhāṣitatūṣṇīṃbhāvadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattisaṃdarśanaguhyaṃ vā,
S04bsu014_u:152_49: sa yānīmāni tathāgatānāṃ kalpapraveśasamavasaraṇajñānāni yaduta ekakalpāsaṃkhyeyakalpasamavasaraṇatā /
S04bsu014_u:152_67: sa yānīmāni tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmavatārajñānāni yaduta vālapathāvatārajñānaṃ vā paramāṇurajovatārajñānaṃ vā buddhakṣetrakāyābhisaṃbodhyavatārajñānaṃ vā sattvakāyacittābhisaṃbodhyavatārajñānaṃ vā sarvatrānugatābhisaṃbodhyavatārajñānaṃ vā vyatyastacarisaṃdarśanāvatārajñānaṃ vā anulomacarisaṃdarśanāvatārajñānaṃ
S04bsu014_u:152_68: vā pratilomacarisaṃdarśanāvatārajñānaṃ cintyācintyalokavijñeyavijñeyaṃ carisaṃdarśanāvatārajñānaṃ vā śrāvakavijñeyapratyekabuddhavijñeyabodhisattvavijñeyatathāgatavijñeyacarisaṃdarśanāvatārajñānaṃ vā,
S04bsu014_u:152_70: iti hi bho jinaputrā aprameyaṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jñānavaipulyamapramāṇamevāsyāṃ bhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasyāvatārajñānam /
S04bsu014_u:152_71: sa khalu punarbho jinaputrā bodhisattva evamimāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanugato 'cintyaṃ ca nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu014_u:152_72: anāvaraṇaṃ ca nāma viśuddhivicayaṃ ca nāma samantamukhāvabhāsaṃ ca nāma tathāgatakośaṃ ca nāma apratihatacakrānugataṃ ca nāma tryadhvānugataṃ ca nāma dharmadhātugarbhaṃ ca nāma vimuktimaṇḍalaprabhāsaṃ ca nāma aśeṣaviṣayagamaṃ ca nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu014_u:152_73: iti hi bho jinaputrā imān daśa bodhisattvavimokṣān pramukhān kṛtvā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāni bodhisattvavimokṣamukhaśatasahasrāṇi bodhisattvo 'syāṃ daśamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhitaḥ pratilabhate /
S04bsu014_u:152_75: jñānālokaśatasahasrāṇi vikurvaṇaśatasahasrāṇi prasaṃvinnirhāraśatasahasrāṇi upāyaprajñāvikrīḍitaśatasahasrāṇi gambhīradharmanayapraveśaśatasahasrāṇi mahākaruṇāvegaśatasahasrāṇi bodhisattvavaśitāpraveśaśatasahasrāṇi pratilabhate /
S04bsu014_u:153_0: sa evaṃjñānānugatayā buddhyā apramāṇānugatena smṛtikauśalyena samanvāgato bhavati /
S04bsu014_u:153_1: sa daśabhyo digbhyo 'prameyāṇāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśādekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtenā apramāṇān mahādharmāvabhāsān mahādharmālokān mahādharmameghān sahate saṃpratīcchati svīkaroti [Dbh_60] saṃghārayati /
S04bsu014_u:153_2: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrāḥ sāgaranāgarājameghavisṛṣṭo mahānapskandho na sukaro 'nyena pṛthivīpradeśena soḍhuṃ vā saṃpratyeṣituṃ vā svīkartuṃ vā saṃdhārayituṃ vā anyatra mahāsamudrāt,
S04bsu014_u:153_3: evameva bho jinaputrā ye te tathāgatānāṃ bhagavatāṃ guhyānupraveśā yaduta mahādharmāvabhāsā mahādharmālokā mahādharmāmeghāḥ,
S04bsu014_u:153_4: te na sukarāḥ sarvasattvaiḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ prathamāṃ bhūmimupādāya yāvannavamībhūmipratiṣṭhitairapi bodhisattvaiḥ,
S04bsu014_u:153_5: tān bodhisattvo 'syāṃ dharmameghāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitaḥ sarvān sahate saṃpratīcchati svīkaroti saṃdhārayati /
S04bsu014_u:153_6: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrā mahāsamudra ekasyāpi mahābhujagendrasya mahāmeghān sahate .
S04bsu014_u:153_9: evameva bho jinaputrā asyāṃ dharmameghāyām bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito bodhisattva ekasyāpi tathāgatasya sakāśādekakṣaṇa .
S04bsu014_u:154_0: vimukticandro bodhisattva āha - śakyaṃ punarbho jinaputra saṃkhyāṃ kartuṃ kiyatāṃ tathāgatānāmantikebhyo bodhisattvaikakṣaṇa .
S04bsu014_u:154_1: ..? vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - na sukarā bho jinaputra saṃkhyā kartu gaṇanānirdeśena - iyatāṃ tathāgatānāmantikebhyo bodhisattvaikakṣaṇa .
S04bsu014_u:154_3: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra daśasu dikṣu daśabuddhakṣetrānabhilāpyakoṭiniyutaśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamāsu lokadhātuṣu yāvat sattvadhātuniravaśeṣayogena saṃvidyate /
S04bsu014_u:154_4: tata ekaḥ sattvaḥ śrutagrahaṇadhāraṇīpratilabdho bhavettathāgatānāmupasthāyako mahāśrāvako 'gryaḥ śrutadharāṇām /
S04bsu014_u:154_5: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavato vajrapadmottarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya mahāvijayo nāma bhikṣurevaṃrūpeṇa śrutakauśalyabalādhānena sa ekaḥ sattvaḥ samanvāgato bhavet /
S04bsu014_u:154_6: yathā ca sa ekaḥ sattvastathā niravaśeṣāsu sarvāsu lokadhātuṣu te sarve sattvāḥ samanvāgatā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu014_u:154_8: tatkiṃ manyase bho jinaputra bahutaraṃ teṣāmaprameyāpramāṇaṃ vā śrutakauśalyaṃ bhavet? vimukticandro bodhisattva āha - bahu bho jinaputra apramāṇaṃ tatteṣāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ śrutakauśalyaṃ bhavet /
S04bsu014_u:154_9: vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - ārocayāmi te bho jinaputra,
S04bsu014_u:154_10: prativedayāmi / yaṃ dharmameghāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito bodhisattva ekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtenaikasyaiva tāvattathāgatasya sakāśāddharmadhātutryadhvakośaṃ nāma mahādharmāvabhāsālokameghaṃ sahate .
S04bsu014_u:154_12: .. kṣamate / yathā caikasya tathāgatasya sakāśāttathā daśasu dikṣu yāvanti tāsu pūrvikāsu lokadhātuṣu paramāṇurajāṃsi saṃvidyante,
S04bsu014_u:154_13: tāvatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ tato 'pi bhūya uttari aprameyāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sakāśādekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtena dharmadhātutryadhvakośaṃ nāma mahādharmāvabhāsālokameghaṃ sahate .
S04bsu014_u:155_1: punaraparaṃ bho jinaputra dharmameghāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvaḥ svapraṇidhānabalādhānato mahākṛpākaruṇāmeghaṃ samutthāpya mahādharmāvabhāsagarjanamabhijñāvidyāvaiśāradyavidyudvidyotitaṃ mahāraśmimārutasamīritaṃ mahāpuṇyajñānaghanābhrajālasaṃdarśanaṃ vividhakāyaghanāvartasaṃdarśanaṃ mahādharmanirnādanaṃ namuciparṣadvidrāvaṇamekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtena daśasu dikṣu yāvanti tāsu lokadhātuṣu tāni paramāṇurajāṃsi saṃvidyante tāvanti lokadhātukoṭinayutaśatasahasrāṇi spharitvā tebhyo 'pi bhūyo 'prameyāṇi lokadhātukotinayutaśatasahasrāṇi spharitvā mahāmṛtakuśaladhārābhipravarṣaṇena yathāśayataḥ sattvānāmajñānasamutthitāḥ sarvakleśarajojvālāḥ praśamayati /
S04bsu014_u:156_0: punaraparaṃ bho jinaputra dharmameghāyāṃ bodhisattva ekasyāmapi lokadhātau tuṣitavarabhavanavāsamupādāya cyavanācaṃkramaṇagarbhasthitijanmābhiniṣkramaṇābhisaṃbodhyadhyeṣaṇamahādharmacakrapravartanamahāparinirvāṇabhūmiriti sarvatathāgatakāryamadhitiṣṭhati yathāśayeṣu sattveṣu yathāvaineyikeṣu,
S04bsu014_u:156_1: evaṃ dvayorapi yāvadyāvanti tāsu lokadhātuṣu paramāṇurajāṃsi saṃvidyante,
S04bsu014_u:157_0: sa evaṃjñānavaśitāprāptaḥ suviniścitamahājñānābhijña ākāṅkṣan saṃkliṣṭāyā lokadhātoḥ pariśuddhatāmadhitiṣṭhati /
S04bsu014_u:157_5: ākāṅkṣan ekasmin paramāṇurajasyekāmapi lokadhātuṃ sarvāvatīṃ sacakravālaparikhāmadhitiṣṭhati /
S04bsu014_u:157_6: tacca paramāṇurajo na vardhayati tāṃ ca kriyāmādarśayati /
S04bsu014_u:157_7: dve 'pi tisro 'pi catasro 'pi pañcāpi yāvadanabhilāpyāpi lokadhāturekasmin paramāṇurajasi sarvāḥ sacakravālaparikhā adhitiṣṭhati /
S04bsu014_u:157_12: ākāṅkṣan yāvadanabhilāpyāsu lokadhātuṣu yaḥ sattvadhātustamekasyāṃ lokadhātau saṃdadhāti,
S04bsu014_u:157_13: na ca sattvān viheṭhayati / ākāṅkṣan ekasyāṃ lokadhātau yāvān sattvadhātustamanabhilāpyāsu lokadhātuṣu saṃdadhāti .
S04bsu014_u:157_17: ākāṅkṣan yāvantyanabhilāpyāsu lokadhātuṣu paramāṇurajāṃsi tāvata ātmabhāvānekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtena nirmimīte /
S04bsu014_u:157_18: ekaikasmiṃśca ātmabhāve tāvata eva pāṇīn saṃdarśayati /
S04bsu014_u:157_20: ekaikena ca pāṇinā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān puṣpapuṭāṃsteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kṣipati /
S04bsu014_u:157_21: yathā puṣpāṇāmevaṃ gandhānāṃ mālyānāṃ vilepanānāṃ cūrṇānāṃ cīvarāṇāṃ chatrāṇāṃ dhvajānāṃ patākānāmevaṃ sarvavyūhānām /
S04bsu014_u:157_31: na ca sattvān viheṭhayati / ākāṅkṣaṃścaikāmapskandhaparyantaṃ lokadhātumadhitiṣṭhati /
S04bsu014_u:157_33: tasya ca mahāpadmasya prabhāvabhāsavyūhena anantā lokadhātūḥ spharati /
S04bsu014_u:157_37: ekamukhavātena caikaikasyā diśaḥ pratidiśamanantā lokadhātūḥ kampayati,
S04bsu014_u:157_38: na ca sattvānuttrāsayati / daśadiśaṃ ca vātasaṃvartanīṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanīmapsaṃvartanīmadhitiṣṭhati /
S04bsu014_u:157_44: iti hi bho jinaputra dharmameghāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito bodhisattva imāni cānyāni cāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāni ṛddhivikurvaṇakoṭinayutaśatasahasrāṇyādarśayati /
S04bsu014_u:158_0: atha khalu tasyāḥ parṣadaḥ keṣāṃcidbodhisattvānāṃ keṣāṃciddevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragaśakrabrahmalokapālamaheśvaraśuddhāvāsānāmetadabhavat - yadi tāvadbodhisattvasyaivamapramāṇa ṛddhyabhisaṃskāragocaraḥ,
S04bsu014_u:158_1: tathāgatānāṃ punaḥ kiṃrūpo bhaviṣyatīti? atha khalu vimukticandro bodhisattvastasyāḥ parṣadaścittāśayavicāramājñāya vajragarbhaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - saṃśayitā bateyaṃ bho jinaputra parṣat /
S04bsu014_u:158_2: sādhu, asyāḥ saṃśayacchityarthaṃ kiṃcinmātraṃ bodhisattvavyūhaprātihāryaṃ saṃdarśaya /
S04bsu014_u:158_3: atha khalu vajragarbho bodhisattvastasyāṃ velāyāṃ sarvabuddhakṣetrakāyasvabhāvasaṃdarśanaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpadyate /
S04bsu014_u:158_5: atha tāvadeva sā sarvāvatī bodhisattvaparṣat sā ca devanāgayakṣaśuddhāvāsaparṣad vajragarbhasya bodhisattvasya kāyāntarībhūtamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma,
S04bsu014_u:158_7: tasmiṃśca buddhakṣetre ye ākāravyūhāste na sukarāḥ paripūrṇayāpi kalpakoṭyā prabhāvayitum /
S04bsu014_u:158_8: tatra ca bodhivṛkṣaṃ daśatrisāhasraśatasahasraviṣkambhaskandhaṃ paripūrṇatrisāhasrakoṭivipulāpramāṇaviṭapodviddhaśikharaṃ tadanurūpaṃ ca tasmin bodhimaṇḍe siṃhāsanavaipulyaṃ tatra sarvābhijñāmatirājaṃ nāma tathāgataṃ bodhimaṇḍavaragataṃ samapaśyat /
S04bsu014_u:158_9: iti hi yāvantastatra vyūhāḥ saṃdṛśyante te na sukarāḥ paripūrṇayāpi kalpakoṭyā prabhāvayitum /
S04bsu014_u:158_10: sa idaṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ saṃdarśya tāṃ sarvāvatīṃ bodhisattvaparṣadaṃ tāṃ ca devanāga .
S04bsu014_u:158_12: atha khalu sā sarvāvatī parṣadāścaryaprāptā tūṣṇīṃbhūtā tameva vajragarbhaṃ bodhisattvaṃ nidhyāyantī sthitābhūt /
S04bsu014_u:158_13: atha khalu vimukticandro bodhisattvo vajragarbhaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - āścaryamidaṃ bho jinaputra,
S04bsu014_u:158_15: tatko nāmāyaṃ bho jinaputra samādhiḥ? vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - sarvabuddhakṣetrakāyasvabhāvasaṃdarśano nāmāyaṃ bho jinaputra samādhiḥ /
S04bsu014_u:158_16: vimukticandro bodhisattva āha - kaḥ punarbho jinaputra asya samādhergocaraviṣayavyūhaḥ? vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - ākāṅkṣan bho jinaputra bodhisattvo 'sya samādheḥ suparibhāvitatvādgaṅgānadīvālikāsamalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāni daśa buddhakṣetrāṇi svakāye ādarśayet,
S04bsu014_u:158_17: ato vā bhūya uttari / īdṛśānāṃ bho jinaputra bodhisattvasamādhīnāṃ dharmameghāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattvo bahūni śatasahasrāṇi pratilabhate /
S04bsu014_u:158_18: tena tasya bodhisattvasya yāvad yauvarājyaprāptairapi bodhisattvaiḥ sādhumatībodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhitairna
S04bsu014_u:158_21: na sukaraṃ mano manaskarma vā jñātum /
S04bsu014_u:158_22: na sukararddhirjñātum / na sukaraṃ tryadhvavilokitaṃ jñātum /
S04bsu014_u:158_26: na sukaraṃ nirmāṇakarma vā adhiṣṭhānakarma vā prabhākarma vā prabhākarma vā jñātum /
S04bsu014_u:158_28: yāvat yauvarājya ... / evamapramāṇā bho jinaputra iyaṃ dharmameghā bodhisattvabhūmiḥ samāsanirdeśataḥ /
S04bsu014_u:159_0: vimukticandro bodhisattva āha - kidṛśo bho jinaputra tathāgatagocaraviṣayapraveśo yatredaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caryāviṣayādhiṣṭhānamevamapramāṇam? vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - tadyathāpi nāma syādbho jinaputra kaścideva puruṣaścaturdvīpikāyā lokadhātordvau trīn vā kolāsthimātrān pāṣāṇān gṛhitvaivaṃ vadet - kiyatī nu khalu sā pṛthivīdhāturaparyantāsu lokadhātuṣu itaḥ pāṣāṇebhyo mahadgatatayā vā pramāṇatveneti? īdṛśamidaṃ mama tvadvacanaṃ pratibhāti /
S04bsu014_u:159_1: yastvamapramāṇajñānināṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ dharmatāṃ bodhisattvadharmatayā tulayasi /
S04bsu014_u:159_2: api tu khalu punarbho jinaputra yathā cāturdvīpikāyā lokadhātoḥ parīttā pṛthivīdhāturyā udgṛhītāpramāṇāvaśiṣṭā,
S04bsu014_u:159_3: evameva bho jinaputra asyā eva tāvaddharmameghāyā bodhisattvabhūmeraprameyān kalpānnirdiśyamānāyāḥ pradeśamātraṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ syāt,
S04bsu014_u:159_5: ārocayāmi te bho jinaputra, prativedayāmi / ayaṃ me tathāgataḥ purataḥ sthitaḥ sākṣībhūtaḥ /
S04bsu014_u:159_6: sacedbho jinaputra daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi aparyantalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇyevaṃbhūmiprāptairbodhisattvaiḥ pūrṇāni bhaveyuryathekṣuvanaṃ vā naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ va,
S04bsu014_u:159_8: .. / iti hi bho jinaputra evaṃjñānānugato bodhisattvastathāgatādvayakāyavākcitto bodhisattvasamādhibalaṃ ca notsṛjati buddhadarśanapūjopasthānaṃ ca karoti /
S04bsu014_u:159_10: audārikānugatayā pūjayā [Dbh_64] teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmadhiṣṭhānāvabhāsaṃ saṃpratīcchati /
S04bsu014_u:159_11: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā asaṃhāryo bhavati dharmadhātuvibhaktiparipṛcchānirdeśaiḥ /
S04bsu014_u:159_14: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra divyakarmārakṛtaṃ mahābharaṇopacāraṃ mahāmaṇiratnapratyuptaṃ vaśavartino devarājasyottamāṅge kaṇṭhe vā āvaddhamasaṃhāryaṃ bhavati tadanyairdivyamānuṣyakairābharaṇavibhūṣaṇopacāraiḥ,
S04bsu014_u:159_15: evameva bho jinaputra bodhisattvasyemāṃ daśamīṃ dharmameghāṃ bhodhisattvabhūmimanuprāptasya te bodhisattvajñanopacārā asaṃhāryā bhavanti sarvasattvaiḥ
S04bsu014_u:159_17: asyāṃ ca bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya jñānavabhāsaḥ sattvānāṃ yāvatsarvajñajñānāvatārāya saṃvartate 'saṃhāryastadanyairjñānāvabhāsaiḥ /
S04bsu014_u:159_18: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra maheśvarasya devarājasyābhā atikrāntā bhavati sarvopapattyāyatanāni,

S04bsu014_u:199_19: upapatti ṣaḍgati vibhaktipraveśataśca snehaṃ ca tṛṣṇamavidyāndhaka karmakṣetrā /
S04bsu014_u:199_21: te vāsanāgati kileśa ca karma cittā suvihāratāya na punargatisanta kāmā /
S04bsu014_u:199_23: evaṃ visaraṇagatāḥ sthita atra bhūmyāṃ sarvasattva āśaya yathendriya yādhimuktiḥ /
S04bsu014_u:199_24: teṣāmarthe dharmavibhakti prakāśayanti pratisaṃvidarthakuśalāḥ pratibhā nirukti // 25 //

S04bsu014_u:199_28: te dhāraṇī daśa asaṃkhyasahasra labdhā dhāranti dharma yatha (sāgara varṣadhārī) // 27 //

S04bsu014_u:199_33: toṣenti sarva yathaindriya-āśayāśca catudvīpasāgara varṣā sama modayanti // 29 //

S04bsu014_u:199_35: deśeyu dharma sugatāḥ puna nānasattvaṃ śrutvā dharema yatha sarvada (bījadhārī) // 30 //
S04bsu014_u:199_36: (yāvatakā) jagadiha praviśanti sattvāḥ (te sarva ekapariṣanmaṇḍale niṣaṇṇāśca) /

S04bsu014_u:199_41: tasya kleśagahanāni prabhā samājya brahmaṇo va dvisahasrikalokadhātuḥ // 33 //

S04bsu014_u:199_45: (dṛṣṭvā sarve diśi jināṃśca vacaḥ śṛṇonti) tato vikurvi praṇidhānanvitāpramāṇāḥ // 35 //
S04bsu014_u:199_46: ityeṣā navamī bhūmirmahājñānavicāriṇā / gambhīrā durdṛśā sūkṣmā nirdiṣṭā sugatātmajāḥ // 36 //

S04bsu014_u:201_8: ekakṣetra sugato niṣaṇṇakaḥ sarvakṣetri pratibhāsa darśayī /
S04bsu014_u:201_10: ekaromu sugatasya raśmayo niścaranti jagakleśa śāmyati /

S04bsu014_u:201_17: niṣkramanta jagahetu nāyako budhyamāna puna bodhimuttamām /
S04bsu014_u:201_19: māyakāra yatha vidyaśikṣito jīvikārtha bahukāya darśayī /
S04bsu014_u:201_23: yatha svabhāvu sugatānagocarā sarvasattva tatha prāpta dharmatām /
S04bsu014_u:201_25: ye tu jñāna sugatāna arthiṃke kalpakalpaparikalpavarjitam /
S04bsu014_u:201_28: marukanyā jinaṃ lokya tūṣṇībhūtāḥ śame ratāḥ // 14 //
S04bsu014_u:202_0: atha khalu vajragarbho bodhisattvo daśadiśaṃ vyavalokya sarvāvatīṃ parṣadaṃ vyavalokya dharmadhātuṃ ca vyavalokayan sarvajñatācittotpādaṃ ca saṃvarṇayan bodhisattvaviṣayamādarśayan caryābalaṃ pariśodhayan sarvākārajñatāsaṃgrahamanuvyāharan sarvalokamalamapakarṣayan sarvajñajñānamupasaṃharan acintyajñānaniryūhamādarśayan bodhisattvaguṇān prabhāvayan evameva bhūmyarthaṃ prarūpayamāṇo buddhānubhāvena tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu014_u:203_1: khilamanavidhutānāṃ mārgajñāne sthitānāṃ śṛṇuta cariviśeṣān bodhisattvāna śreṣṭhān // 17 //
S04bsu014_u:203_2: kuśalaśatasahasraṃ saṃciyā kalpakoṭyā buddhaśatasahasrān pūjayitvā maharṣīn /

S04bsu014_u:203_7: samyaganugatārthe yāvatā sarvadharmān mokṣa jagata arthe jāyate bodhicittam // 20 //

S04bsu014_u:205_0: etāstāḥ khalu punarbho jinaputrā daśa bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ samāsato nirdiṣṭāḥ sarvākāravaropetasarvajñajñānānugatā draṣṭavyāḥ /

S04bsu014_u:206_0: atha tasmin samaye bhagavāṃstān vimukticandrapramukhān sarvān bodhisattvānāmantrya evamādiśat - imāmahaṃ mārṣā asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrasamudānītāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yuṣmākaṃ haste parindāmi anuparindāmi paramayā parindanayā /
S04bsu014_u:206_1: tadyūyaṃ sarve svayaṃ caivamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayata,
S04bsu014_u:206_3: saṃkṣepānmārṣā yadi tathāgataḥ kalpasthitikenāyuḥpramāṇena rātriṃdivamadhitiṣṭhamāno 'sya dharmaparyāyasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S04bsu014_u:206_7: evameva mārṣā ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati,
S04bsu014_u:206_8: parṣanmadhye ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati - anena cittena kathamamī sattvā evamudāradharmasya lābhinaḥ syuriti śraddhayā satkṛtya śrāvayiṣyanti śroṣyanti ca yoniśo manasi bhāvayiṣyanti ca /
S04bsu014_u:206_9: pustakalikhitaṃ kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyati satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati /
S04bsu014_u:206_10: amātsaryacittatayā asya dharmaparyāyasya varṇaṃ bhāṣitvā likhanāya vācanāya svādhyayanāya pūjanāya darśanāya dāsyati,
S04bsu014_u:207_0: atha khalu bhagavānasyaiva dharmaparyāyasya bhūyasyā mātrayā anuparindanārthaṃ tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu014_u:208_0: sattvā dṛṣṭā ye mayā buddhadṛṣṭyā te 'rhantaḥ syuḥ śāriputreṇa tulyāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:208_2: pratyekabuddhāya tu yaśca pūjāṃ kuryādahorātramapi prahṛṣṭaḥ /

S04bsu014_u:208_9: buddhā bhaveyuryadi sarvasattvāstān pūjayet yaśca yathaiva pūrvam /
S04bsu014_u:208_10: divyaiśca puṣpairatha mānuṣaiśca kalpānanekān bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ // 5 //

S04bsu014_u:208_18: na vyañjanād grasyati nāpi cārthād dadāti yaḥ sūtramidaṃ parebhyaḥ // 9 //
S04bsu014_u:208_19: anuttarāsau naranāyakānāṃ sattvo na kaścit sadṛśo 'sya vidyate /
S04bsu014_u:208_20: bhavetsamudreṇa samaśca so 'kṣayaḥ śrutvā hi yo dharmamimaṃ prapadyate // 10 //
